items.message:
This Flood Alert has been removed.  
River levels have now fallen below the flood risk threshold.  There is no longer a threat of flooding, though standing water and debris may still remain.  No further rainfall is forecast over the next couple of days.  
We continue to monitor the situation.   
Please avoid contact with flood water.

items.description: Upper River Derwent, Stonethwaite Beck and Derwent Water
items.message: River and lake levels remain high although slowly falling. Flooding is affecting locations near the Upper River Derwent, Stonethwaite Beck and Derwent Water, with low lying land and roads expected to be most affected, particularly around The Upper Derwent from Seathwaite to Derwent Water. Avoid using low lying footpaths and any bridges near local watercourses. Take care and avoid walking, cycling or driving through flood water. No rainfall is expected today Tuesday 23/09/2025 and tomorrow Wednesday 24/09/2025. This message will be updated by 10:00 AM tomorrow Wednesday 24/09/2025, or as the situation changes.
